A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the worst movies in the franchise. I left the theater having no recollection of a \"good \" part. I've enjoyed every SW movie up until this. I don't consider myself a huge fan either. At the end of the movie the characters are exactly where they were before it started(minus a few cool things set up in The Force Awakens). \nOverall\, incredibly bad. This movie takes 2.5 hours to get nowhere. I found myself cheering for the villains because everything the rebellion did was so stupid.
